name: AskHannibalLecter
0:
”Alexa open Hannibal Lecter.”
”What should I do with the lotion?”
”Where should I go for vacation?”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: hannibal lecter
des: Do you ever have questions about what to do with the lotion, dinner plans, travel, the census or wine pairings? Let Hannibal Lecter answer the questions for you. Especially creepy in whisper mode. Enjoy with your friends on Halloween or any day of the year.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
